trans-unit.source: Defines values for specifying the parts of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that are to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Define valores para especificar as partes de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used by the protected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Paint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and by handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Esta enumeração é utilizada por protegida <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Paint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método e processadores para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint>eventos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Paint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: All parts of the cell should be painted.
trans-unit.target: Todas as partes da célula devem ser desenhadas.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The background of the cell should be painted.
trans-unit.target: Deve ser pintado o fundo da célula.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The border of the cell should be painted.
trans-unit.target: O limite da célula deve ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The background of the cell content should be painted.
trans-unit.target: Deve ser pintado o fundo do conteúdo da célula.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The foreground of the cell content should be painted.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro plano do conteúdo da célula deve ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The cell error icon should be painted.
trans-unit.target: O ícone de erro da célula deve ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The focus rectangle should be painted around the cell.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo de foco deve ser desenhado à volta de célula.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Nothing should be painted.
trans-unit.target: Nada deve ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The background of the cell should be painted when the cell is selected.
trans-unit.target: Deve ser pintado o fundo da célula quando a célula está selecionada.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
